mapper.select: SELECT * FROM player order by p_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into player ( p_name, p_position, p_power, p_technique, p_physical, p_speed, p_active, p_passive1, p_passive2, p_passive3, p_thumb, p_full, p_stone1, p_stone2, p_stone3, p_date, p_attribute, p_tier, p_story ) values ( #{p_name}, #{p_position}, #{p_power}, #{p_technique}, #{p_physical}, #{p_speed}, #{p_active}, #{p_passive1}, #{p_passive2}, #{p_passive3}, #{p_thumb}, #{p_full}, #{p_stone1}, #{p_stone2}, #{p_stone3}, #{p_date}, #{p_attribute}, #{p_tier}, #{p_story} )
